title: Cheat Status
subtitle: Real-time monitoring and status updates for all gaming enhancement tools

products.description: Advanced aimbot with humanized movements and anti-detection algorithms
ESP and wallhack features with customizable visual overlays
Automatic shooting system with configurable reaction times
Legacy radar system for player and item detection
Automated building sequences and defensive structures
Enemy highlighting and distance calculation system
Subtle aim assistance with natural movement patterns
Automatic recoil compensation for all weapon types
